articles.title: Tech Company Imagines The Nintendo Switch As A Fully Functioning PC - Kotaku
articles.description: The Nintendo Switch is great, but it would be even better if it could also work like any other computer tablet. Chinese tech manufacturer Lenovo tried to show off what that dream would actually look like with its new prototype: the LaVie Mini.
